short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ctrl+Shift+S to navigate to the search bar on any page!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search for Search is a simple, lightweight tool which provides the shortcut Control+Shift+S (Windows) or Command+Shift+S (Mac) to navigate to the search bar on almost any web page.

Options are provided to cycle between multiple search bars on a page and to clear the search bar when the shortcut is used.
